title: Scandinavian ornament wanted --THANX--
content:
Hi there,   
   
I would like to thank everyone for replying enthousiastically to my thread on the Scandinavian ornaments. I have now a lot of info I can work with. I will use the X-mas days to get started. It will be quite difficult because I've never done something like that.   
Besides that I will start with expanding my Nordic to a complete family with all the weights and widths.   
   
I will keep you updated when I have something to show.   
   
Ren
author: Rene Verkaart
